definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: staff;—abs. Ju Jdg 6:21, 2Ki 4:31; cstr. 2Ki 18:20 +; sf. [[מִשְׁעַנְתּוֹ]] Ex 21:19, Zec 8:4, etc.; pl. sf. [[מִשְׁעֲנׁתָם]] Nu 21:18;—staff, Ex 21:19 (E) Nu 21:18 (J) Ju Jdg 6:21, 2Ki 4:29, 2Ki 4:29, 2Ki 4:31, Zec 8:4; fig. of political support, [[מִשְׁעֶנֶת הַקָּנֶה הָרָחוּץ]] 2Ki 18:21 = Is 36:6, cf. Ez Eze 29:6; of ´[[י]]: as shepherd Ps 23:4 (+[[שֵׁבֶט]]).
